Package org.drools.brms.client.modeldriven.ui

Class Summary
ActionInsertFactWidget This is used when asserting a new fact into working memory.
ActionRetractFactWidget This is used when you want to retract a fact.
ActionSetFieldWidget This widget is for setting fields on a bound fact or global variable.
CompositeFactPatternWidget This represents a top level CE, like an OR, NOT, EXIST etc...
ConstraintValueEditor This is an editor for constraint values.
DSLSentenceWidget This displays a widget to edit a DSL sentence.
FactPatternWidget This is the new smart widget that works off the model.
RuleAttributeWidget Displays a list of rule options (attributes).
RuleModeller This is the parent widget that contains the model based rule builder.
